name: instant
content:

B2 happening immediately, without any delay: instant access This type of account offers you instant access to your money.instant success Contrary to expectations, the film was an instant success.
Instant food or drink is dried, usually in the form of a powder, and can be prepared very quickly by adding hot water: instant coffee/soup
More examplesFewer examplesI'm afraid Dad took an instant dislike to this new boyfriend of yours.Some people expect instant gratification .I felt an instant aversion to his parents.There's no instant way of finding a cure - it's just a process of trial and error.I can't stand instant coffee.

a very short moment of time, or a particular point in time: At that instant, someone knocked on the door. Call me the instant you get home (= as soon as you get to your home).
happening immediately: I took an instant liking to him.
An instant food or drink is one, usually in dried or powdered form, that can be prepared easily and quickly, esp. by adding hot water: instant coffee
